I'm Josh Martin
About

I am a Designer, Illustrator, & Front-End Developer from Pittsburgh, PA living in Chicago, IL. I currently work as an independent product designer, focusing on web/app UI/UX and creative direction.

In my free time, I work on variety of side projects that reflect a number of personal interests. Feel free to check them out: Brood, Reveew, Alleyooop

I have a storefront to buy digital resources. I hope to open one for prints soon.

Portfolio: Dribbble
